solution_line_template: After giving away 4/5 of the cupcakes, Anna has {total_cupcakes} / {divisor} = <<{total_cupcakes}/{divisor}={remaining_cupcakes}>>{remaining_cupcakes} cupcakes
After eating {cupcakes_eaten} cupcakes, Anna has {remaining_cupcakes} - {cupcakes_eaten} = <<{remaining_cupcakes}-{cupcakes_eaten}={cupcakes_left}>>{cupcakes_left} cupcakes.
